Employment Types and FSI supported

Contract Employment

Contract employment is where you are hired by an employer like us {Fargo Solutions}.

We will market you with our tier 1 vendors {Genesis, Insight Global, Apex Systems, TajTech,}.

They will present your resume to their client {e.g.BCBS, Medica, UCare, TCF Bank, State of MN}.

If the client likes your profile they will request an audience with you in the form of a phone, video or face-2-face conversation, interview.

If you pass the clients designated rounds you will be selected for the contract role.

Typical contract roles start with 3+months or 6+months with possible extension.

The extension of the contract depends on various conditions such as bugdet, product delivery, your performance.

Primarily it depends on the consultants relationship wit the hiring manager or the client Point ofContact(POC) who oversees the project you are hired for.

To know more about Contract roles or speak with us Click here.

Contract to Hire Employment
Part time Employment

Part Time employment is where you work 20 hours instead of your full 40 hours.

Be it client, for FSI, doesnt matter the time will be capped at 20-25 hours per week

Normally, people who are in between jobs, or in college prefer to do part time

We help students work part time with us and also assist with the steps involved for college permission.

To know more about how you can work on part-time or as an intern with FSI Contact Us

FullTime Employment

Full time employment is to be selected by the client directly from market.

They will setup an interview process consisting of multiple rounds including HR, personality match, work type, salary expectation and others as client sees fit.

They will many many things additionally required before going for the interview, such as pre-screening, tests or any specific item the client may need to verify your qualifications


It is possible to go full time from working on our projects with the client directly.

In such case there are policies and steps involved which need to be followed strictly before going fulltime with our client.

There are also a number of things that are required to be completed which FSI will help you with once over a year of contract term has been completed.

These are non-negotiable and will be required before going fulltime with client.

To know more about fulltime any other queries related to fulltime Contact Us.
